name: Flooded Cave
description: A dark cave partially filled with water. The sound of dripping water echoes throughout.

rooms.name: Cave Entrance
rooms.description: The entrance to the cave, where light from outside barely reaches.

rooms.name: Water Pool
rooms.description: A shallow pool of water fills this part of the cave. The water is clear but cold.

rooms.name: Narrow Passage
rooms.description: A tight passageway that seems to lead deeper into the cave system.
